Use natural light: By opening blinds or curtains, you can let sunlight in to warm up the room, or close them to block out sunlight and keep the room cool.
Use fans: By using a fan to circulate air, you can create a breeze and help regulate the indoor temperature.
Use a portable heater or air conditioner: If you have access to a portable heater or air conditioner, you can use it to heat or cool the room as needed.
Use insulation: By adding insulation to the walls or ceiling, you can help retain heat or keep the room cool.
Use a humidifier or dehumidifier: By adjusting the humidity level in the room, you can help regulate the indoor temperature.
